Class DataSourceGroupingImpl

java.lang.Object

DataSource
public class DataSourceGroupingImpl
extends DataSourceImpl

DataSource implementation that supports groupBy fields.

getTotals

public DataRecord getTotals(java.lang.String restriction)
Retrieve records that contains totals for all calculated fields. Runs modified query without GROUP BY clause. SELECT count(pr_id) FROM property

Parameters:
restriction - Client-supplied restriction string, or null.
Returns:
DataRecord with totals.

getSubtotals

public java.util.List<DataRecord> getSubtotals(java.lang.String restriction,
                                               java.lang.String groupingFieldName)
Retrieve records that contains subtotals for all calculated fields and specified grouping field. SELECT program_id, sum(cost_budget_cap) FROM prog_budget_items GROUP BY program_id

Parameters:
restriction - Client-supplied restriction string, or null.
Returns:
List of records.
